attributes.action: stop imposing strict deadlines on on Number 10 website petitions or else resign for re-election annually.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am aware that many signatories can die in the space of a year, but the same applies to voters, and I see no evidence of the government seeking to drastically reduce its term. Therefore the time restriction on the petitions seems anti-democratic, against the purported spirit of the website, and designed merely to undermine grass roots democracy.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
